refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns an array of resources representing the fields in a result set

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an array of resources which contains field definition information or &false; if no field information is available.
Object properties
Property Description
name The name of the column
max_length The maximum width of the field for the result set.
type The data type used for this field
decimals The number of decimals used (for integer fields)
